law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 33, effective March 1, 2005. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 30, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 422, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 21, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 33, sec. 2, effective June 18, 1970.

metadata.lrc-note: (3/1/2005). 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 51, states that "[t]he amendments made to KRS 304.33-020 in [2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 33] shall apply to proceedings initiated on or after August 1, 2004."
